json.text: Hi, I’m Kathleen from The Catholic Company and this is The My First Bible.
Ideal for ages 3 to 6, This sturdy board book offers your child a simple and colorful introduction
to God's saving Word.  This Catholic Bible for toddlers contains the best-loved Bible
stories from creation to the Resurrection. Its large print, age-appropriate text for
beginning readers runs along the top of each page, while a read aloud section for parents
follows at the bottom. Unique picture tabs allow children to easily locate their favorite
The My First Bible has received 5 out of 5 stars. One of our customers said, “This
was perfect for my godson. It is a very durable book, with pictures a child can understand,
also large print for him to read in later years, and a story guide for his parents to
Thank you for your interest in The Catholic Company, and God Bless!
